Drug Class

Source: R/DrugConstructor.R
Drug-class.Rd

Initialize a new Drug object

Get the dose labels in order

Print a summary of the drug

Get the number of dose levels

Get the dose levels

Add a new dose level

Arguments

drugData

List containing drug information from a YAML file

name

Character string for the drug name

doseCount

Numeric value for the number of dose levels

doseLabel

Optional character string for a specific dose label

new_label

Optional character string for the new dose label

new_level

Numeric value for the new dose level

Value

Character vector of dose labels

Numeric value of the number of dose levels

Numeric vector of dose levels or a single dose level

Details

A reference class that represents a single drug with multiple dose levels. This class manages the dose levels and provides methods to interact with them.

Fields

name

Character string for the drug name

doses

List of dose levels with their corresponding names

Contents
